scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development nodemon $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --inspect -w ../../packages -w express -w graphql -w lib -w modules -w .env -w package.json -w ../yarn.lock -w server.js -w index.js index.js
scripts.db:reset:seed: yarn run db:reset && yarn run db:seed:users && yarn run db:seed:crowdfundings
scripts.db:reset: node script/db-migrate-all.js reset && node script/db-migrate-all.js up
scripts.translations: yarn run translations:local && yarn run translations:crowdfunding
scripts.launch: yarn run db:migrate:up && node script/launch/activateMemberships.js && node script/launch/add_launch_data.js
scripts.test:prepare: rm -rf node_modules/.bin && ln -s ../../../node_modules/.bin node_modules/ && dropdb --if-exists republik-test && createdb republik-test && NODE_ENV=development OVERWRITE_ENV=.test.env yarn run db:reset:seed
scripts.test:travis: yarn run test:prepare && istanbul cover tape "__tests__/**/*.test.js" --report lcovonly
scripts.test:watch: yarn run test:prepare && NODE_ENV=development OVERWRITE_ENV=.test.env nodemon --exec 'tape "__tests__/**/*.test.js"' | tap-diff
scripts.test:run: NODE_ENV=development OVERWRITE_ENV=.test.env istanbul cover tape "__tests__/**/*.test.js" | tap-diff
scripts.test: yarn run test:prepare && yarn run test:run
